question: What was the original requirement of "Magna carta"?
option1: To bring the powers of King under law
option2: To make the power of the kings beyond Law
option3: To limit the power of Barons
answer: To bring the powers of King under law
explanation: Magna Carta was brought in to end the tussle between Pope Innocent III, King John and his English barons about the rights of the King.The King was to renounce certain rights, respect certain legal procedures and his powers could be brought under the law.
